name: Collaboration Land
description:
Our 2nd year devs were tasked with creating individual systems to run a small city simulation. The students and their systems were to communicate and work collaboratively to reach the goal of creating a lively city simulation.

Credits:

  • Marnus Labuschagne
  • Aubrey Greyling
  • Hermanus Marais
  • David Olivier
  • Danielle Muller
  • Delon Prinsloo
  • Divan van Tonder
  • Jared Brandjes
  • Lucille Roux
